title: Random people adding me?
body:
Okay so this happened to me 4 times.
I log on to League, I see a friend request, I look at their profile and it's a person being Diamond+ in solo/duo and I have never played with them, and once I added them and ask them why they added me they say ''I don't even remember adding you lol''. They don't seem to be bots, but what I have realized is that they are extremly friendly, and flirty (I have no idea if they know if I am a girl or not but it's creeping the hell out of me)

So my quesition is, has this happened anyone else than me? And do you know why and how?

P.S I find it really strange that Diamond+ are adding me since I am only Gold
/Thanks Cookie
